project_descr: The project aims to socially and economically empower disadvantaged youth and women in market oriented technical, entrepreneurial and managerial skills, confidence building and empowering skills.

donor_name: YLNG is the major investment in Yemen producing Gas for export.  he gas feed is from Marib area transferred through  a 320 KM gas pipeline to the South Coast Port of Shabwah, Balhaf, where the Liquidification plant is located. The project has contributed greatly in the develpment of the Pipeline areas in the governorates of Marib and Shabwah through its Sustainable Develpment Strategy
